title: Here's One
content:
Hello,

Anyone have any idea what this might be? It’s not curved horizontally, it’s just on a round surface and that’s why the end looks like it drops off a little.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071209191412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tb_logo_6455.gif)

Many thanks!

 [‹ Need help, urgent](http://web.archive.org/web/20071209191412/http:/typophile.com/node/39875 "Go to previous forum topic") [Historical Sign Project ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071209191412/http:/typophile.com/node/39842 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hallipa

comments.content: Woot! Thanks a lot, it’s much appreciated.
